review: We had a great experience with the doctor. The clinic is very hygienic. The doctor explained the problem properly and did the whole procedure with utmost care. She is very experienced , calm , humble and make the whole experience of teeth surgery stress and anxious free. We highly recommend the doctor for any teeth related problems.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.

review:
It was a great experience with Dr.Pallavi. During the first lock down I had severe toothache & headache. When the lockdown lifted I immediately visited Denta kshetra. The ambiance & staff are very good. The  treatment has been done following all the Covid protocol . I am extremely happy with the treatment. I highly recommend Denta kshetra & Dr. Pallavi. She is a highly dedicated & a caring Doctor.
Thank You Dr.Pallavi for your valuable service
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback

review: First time when I met the doctor with Severe toothache, I was nervous and reeling with pain in the jaw. She heard me and explained with patience why this problem has developed. My negligence in not taking proper care of my teeth. She explained with great confidence about the treatment with RCT and further crown to save the teeth from breaking. I found her to be an Excellent professional with ethical values. After treatment, now I was absolutely with healthy teeth. Thanks doctors. Would surely suggest people to visit her dental hospital to keep ur teeth hale and healthy.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your feedback & I appreciate the same
